thread.title_full: Parthiban roped in for Vikram-Gautham's Dhruva Natchathiram : Celebrities, News - India Today

title: Parthiban roped in for Vikram-Gautham's Dhruva Natchathiram : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
Parthiban roped in for Vikram-Gautham's Dhruva Natchathiram Chiyaan Vikram's Dhruva Natchathiram will have actor-director Parthiban playing an important role. IndiaToday.in | Written by Srivatsan Vikram (L) Parthiban (R) 
With every passing day, Vikram-Gautham Menon's spy thriller Dhruva Natchathiram is getting bigger and better. 
The latest addition to the cast is none other than actor-director Parthiban, who earned a strong fanbase after playing pivotal roles in films like Masss and Naanum Rowdy Thaan. 
With that said, Parthipan was supposed to play the prime antagonist in Dhruva Natchathiram when it was launched with Suriya . 
Speaking about the film, Parthipan was quoted by Silverscreen as saying, "I had seen the news of me playing the villain in the film on Twitter recently. I was actually playing that role when Suriya was part of the project. But now, I don't know what my role is." 
However, Rajasekar, an industry source, confirmed the news on Twitter. #DhruvaNatchathiram update: @rparthiepan on board to play a crucial role! pic.twitter.com/HxxBNDMtzd â€” Rajasekar (@sekartweets) February 12, 2017 
Made on the lines of the Bourne series, Dhruva Natchathiram teaser opened to fantastic response from fans and has garnered more than 6 million views as of now. 
To be produced by Ondraga Entertainment along with another leading production house, Ritu Varma of Pelli Choopulu fame has replaced Anu Emmanuel as the leading lady. 
Dhruva Natchathiram is slated to release in August.
